qas.question: Christoph Waltz's appearance in future Bond movies is contingent on the appearance of which other actor?
When will work being on the follow-up to Spectre?
When will the sequel to Spectre being development?
A prequel to Spectre will begin when?
Who will return to direct the next 007 film?
Who has signed on for three more films in the series?
Whose return depends on whether or not Sam Mendes returns to portray Bond?

context: A sequel to Spectre will begin development in <a1_0><a2_0><b3_0>spring 2016<b3_0/><a1_0/>.<a2_0/> <b4_0>Sam Mendes<b4_0/> has stated he will not return to direct the next 007 film. <b5_0><b6_0>Christoph Waltz<b6_0/><b5_0/> has signed on for two more films in the series, but his return depends on whether or not <a0_0>Craig<a0_0/> will again portray Bond.
